buttons.label: Google
buttons.description: Google is is an American multinational technology company that specializes in Internet-related services and products
author: Sergey Brin
Larry Page

buttons.label: Apple
buttons.description: Apple Inc. is an American multinational technology company that specializes in consumer electronics, computer software and online services.
author: Steve Jobs
Steve Wozniak

buttons.label: Microsoft
buttons.description: Microsoft Corporation is an American multinational technology corporation which produces computer software, consumer electronics, personal computers, and related services.
author: Bill Gates

buttons.label: Amazon
buttons.description: Amazon.com, Inc. is an American multinational technology company which focuses on e-commerce, cloud computing, digital streaming, and artificial intelligences
author: Jeff Bezos

buttons.label: Netflix
buttons.description: Netflix, Inc. is an American subscription streaming service and production company.
author: Reed
Marc
